get.description: Get currency information for the store.
Get all countries and regions information for the store.
Get country and region information for the store.

post.description: Create customer account. Perform necessary business operations like sending email.

get.description: Check if password reset token is valid.

schema.description: True if the token is valid

put.description: Send an email to the customer with a password reset link.

post.description: Check if given email is associated with a customer account in given website.

websiteId.description: If not set, will use the current websiteId

get.description: Make Full Text Search and return found Documents
Enable a guest user to return information for a specified cart.

post.description: Enable an customer or guest user to create an empty cart and quote for an anonymous customer.

put.description: Place an order for a specified cart.

get.description: List applicable shipping methods for a specified quote.

post.description: Estimate shipping by address and return list of available shipping methods

get.description: List items that are assigned to a specified cart.

post.description: Add the specified item to the specified cart.

put.description: Add the specified item to the specified cart.

delete.description: Remove the specified item from the specified cart.

parameters.name: itemId
parameters.description: The item ID of the item to be removed.

get.description: Return the payment method for a specified shopping cart.

put.description: Add a specified payment method to a specified shopping cart.

get.description: List available payment methods for a specified shopping cart. This call returns an array of objects, but detailed information about each object’s attributes might not be included.  See http://devdocs.magento.com/codelinks/attributes.html#GuestPaymentMethodManagementInterface to determine which call to use to get detailed information about all attributes for an object.
Return the billing address for a specified quote.

post.description: Assign a specified billing address to a specified cart.

get.description: Return information for a coupon in a specified cart.

delete.description: Delete a coupon from a specified cart.

put.description: Add a coupon by code to a specified cart.
Set shipping/billing methods and additional data for cart and collect totals for guest.

get.description: Return quote totals data for a specified cart.
Return the gift message for a specified order.

post.description: Set the gift message for an entire order.

get.description: Return the gift message for a specified item in a specified shopping cart.

post.description: Set the gift message for a specified item in a specified shopping cart.
Calculate quote totals based on address and shipping method.
Set payment information and place order for a specified cart.
Set payment information for a specified cart.
Create access token for admin given the admin credentials.
Create access token for admin given the customer credentials.

base_currency_code.description: The base currency code for the store.

base_currency_symbol.description: The currency symbol of the base currency for the store.

default_display_currency_code.description: The default display currency code for the store.

default_display_currency_symbol.description: The currency symbol of the default display currency for the store.

available_currency_codes.description: The list of allowed currency codes for the store.

exchange_rates.description: The list of exchange rate information for the store.

currency_to.description: The currency code associated with the exchange rate.

rate.description: The exchange rate for the associated currency and the store's base currency.

id.description: The country id for the store.

two_letter_abbreviation.description: The country 2 letter abbreviation for the store.

three_letter_abbreviation.description: The country 3 letter abbreviation for the store.

full_name_locale.description: The country full name (in store locale) for the store.

full_name_english.description: The country full name (in English) for the store.

available_regions.description: The available regions for the store.

default_shipping.description: If this address is default shipping address.

default_billing.description: If this address is default billing address

framework-search-filter-group.description: Groups two or more filters together using a logical OR

filters.description: A list of filters in this group

framework-filter.description: Filter which can be used by any methods from service layer.

created_at.description: Cart creation date and time. Otherwise, null.

updated_at.description: Cart last update date and time. Otherwise, null.

converted_at.description: Cart conversion date and time. Otherwise, null.

is_active.description: Active status flag value. Otherwise, null.

items_count.description: Number of different items or products in the cart. Otherwise, null.

items_qty.description: Total quantity of all cart items. Otherwise, null.

customer_is_guest.description: For guest customers, false for logged in customers

store_to_base_rate.description: Store currency to base currency rate

store_to_quote_rate.description: Store currency to quote currency rate

base_to_global_rate.description: Base currency to global currency rate

base_to_quote_rate.description: Base currency to quote currency rate

available.description: The value of the availability flag for the current shipping method.

subtotal_with_discount.description: Subtotal in quote currency with applied discount

base_subtotal_with_discount.description: Subtotal in base currency with applied discount

shipping_discount_amount.description: Shipping discount amount in quote currency

base_shipping_discount_amount.description: Shipping discount amount in base currency

weee_tax_applied_amount.description: Item weee tax applied amount in quote currency.

shipping_tax_amount.description: Shipping tax amount in quote currency

base_shipping_tax_amount.description: Shipping tax amount in base currency

subtotal_incl_tax.description: Subtotal including tax in quote currency

base_subtotal_incl_tax.description: Subtotal including tax in base currency

shipping_incl_tax.description: Shipping including tax in quote currency

base_shipping_incl_tax.description: Shipping including tax in base currency

row_total_with_discount.description: Row total with discount in quote currency. Otherwise, null.

tax_amount.description: Tax amount in quote currency. Otherwise, null.

base_tax_amount.description: Tax amount in base currency. Otherwise, null.

discount_amount.description: Discount amount in quote currency. Otherwise, null.

base_discount_amount.description: Discount amount in base currency. Otherwise, null.

price_incl_tax.description: Price including tax in quote currency. Otherwise, null.

base_price_incl_tax.description: Price including tax in base currency. Otherwise, null.

row_total_incl_tax.description: Row total including tax in quote currency. Otherwise, null.

base_row_total_incl_tax.description: Row total including tax in base currency. Otherwise, null.

weee_tax_applied_amount.description: Item weee tax applied amount in quote currency.

weee_tax_applied.description: Item weee tax applied in quote currency.
